CDS: compliance detection system|content delivery system|automated compliance monitoring
CSAM: child sexual abuse material|exploitation|NCMEC|T5 content|child abuse
DRT: data retention threshold|log retention|data storage duration|retention policy
Redline: legal review flag|compliance escalation|regulatory concern marker
Spanner: rule engine|policy enforcement engine|compliance logic processor
NSP: non-shareable policy|content sharing restriction|external sharing prohibition
Jellybean: parental control system|family safety framework|guardian management
BB: baseline behavior|standard user patterns|anomaly detection reference
Snowcap: child safety framework|minor protection policy|underage user safeguards
IMT: internal monitoring trigger|compliance alert system|policy violation detector
Utah: Utah Social Media Regulation Act|minor curfew law|parental consent requirement
California: SB976|California social media law|teen protection act|personalized feed restrictions
Florida: Online Protections for Minors|parental notification law|minor account restrictions
NCMEC: National Center for Missing and Exploited Children|child abuse reporting|18 USC 2258A
